attributes.action: cut down on single buses and use double deckers instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every town or city you go to always got 3 single buses going in one direction or every two minute a bus will travel on that road, causing traffic jams as one stops in middle of road to pick up someone, go back to the old days with double deckers running to a timetable and parked up in bus stops
